E F M S T 

S

send(String, String, String, String, String) - Method in class Email
It sets up the connection between the server and the user and it sends the meeting invite to the given guests
send(String, String, String, String, String) - Static method in class Mailer
Is responsible for taking from,password,to,sub and message as parameters from SendMailSSL.send1(), setting up connection to the server, password authentication of Email ID and sending email to the intended user
send1(String, String, String, String, String) - Static method in class SendMailSSL
Is responsible for taking start_date,start_time,end_date,end_time and location as parameter from the user and passing it to send and send_to belonging to Mailer class and Email class respectively
send_to(String, String, String, String, String) - Static method in class Email
It creates an instance of the class Email and calls the function send() by passing the details of the meeting as argument to the function
SendMailSSL - Class in <Unnamed>
Is responsible for directing the data from Time_zone_change to Mailer class and Email class respectively
SendMailSSL() - Constructor for class SendMailSSL
